About Centre For Quantum Technologies

The Centre for Quantum Technologies (CQT) is a research centre of excellence at the National University of Singapore doing cutting-edge theoretical and experimental science. CQT is located on the campus of the National University of Singapore and offers a friendly, international work environment. Learn more about CQT at www.quantumlah.org.


Our group has developed an optical atomic clock based on Lu+. Lutetium is a unique clock candidate in that it supports three clock transitions within the one atom enabling rigorous consistency checks on clock performance. We have shown that two of these transitions have very low systematic shifts making them competitive with the best systems in the world. In 2019 we demonstrated the feasibility of operating the clock with multiple ions which will enable improvements in measurement precision. More recently we demonstrated agreement between two clocks at the level of 10-18, which was limited by the measurement statistics and not systematic uncertainty. To further advance clock performance and develop local expertise in optical clocks, we now looking to establish in-house capabilities in the design and implementation of ultra-stable optical resonators.

Are you ready to embrace the challenge? Come build the future with us.

Key job responsibilities

Associate Technical Account Manager

Associate Technical Account Managers (TAM) support AWS customers’ creative and transformative spirit of innovation across all technologies, including but not limited to: Compute, Storage, Database, Big Data, Application-level Services, Networking, Serverless, Deployment, and Security. Associate TAMs provide advocacy and strategic technical guidance to help plan and build solutions using best practices, and proactively keep customers’ AWS environments operationally healthy.

Associate TAMs work with both technical and business leaders at AWS customers. Longterm planning and driving toward successful technical and business outcomes is an Associate TAM's primary focus. Associate TAMs do this by leading both tactical and strategic activities for AWS customers such as issue escalation, launch support planning, training initiatives, operational reviews, cost optimization, and more. Associate TAMs advocate for their customers with AWS leadership at all levels.

Internally, Associate TAMs are able to dive deep and contribute to the larger AWS community. Associate TAMs are able to do this via Technical Field Communities; Areas of Depth; content development; leading or contributing to projects; and many other activities.

Inclusive Team Culture

Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious about diverse perspectives. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.

Work/Life Harmony

Our team puts a high value on work-life harmony. It isn’t about how many hours you spend at home or at work; it’s about the flow you establish that brings energy to both parts of your life.
